citations.narrative:
A section of metal pipe in the red fox enclosure is severely rusted and loosing structural integrity. On the front wall of the
fox enclosure, the bottom metal pipe has an area about one foot in length that has severely rusted and is breaking apart
along the bottom edge. There are multiple holes in the metal pipe were the metal has completely rusted out. Another
rusted out, small metal hole is present near the front left corner of the enclosure on the same pipe. Sharp edges from
metal and disintegrating pipes can lead to injury of the animal or structurally instability of the primary enclosure. Correct
by ensuring all outdoor housing facilities are structurally sound and maintained in good repair to protect the animals from
injury and to contain the animals.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.125(a)  Repeat
   
Facilities, general. 
A section of metal pipe in the red fox enclosure is severely rusted and loosing structural integrity. On the front wall of the 
fox enclosure, the bottom metal pipe has an area about one foot in length that has severely rusted and is breaking apart 
along the bottom edge. There are multiple holes in the metal pipe were the metal has completely rusted out. Another 
rusted out, small metal hole is present near the front left corner of the enclosure on the same pipe. Sharp edges from 
metal and disintegrating pipes can lead to injury of the animal or structurally instability of the primary enclosure. Correct 
by ensuring all outdoor housing facilities are structurally sound and maintained in good repair to protect the animals from 
injury and to contain the animals. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n

species.common: RED FOX (INCLUDES SILVER FOX & CROSS FOX)
